summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新数据源的一组数据命令和一个数据源连接。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a data source that are used to fill the and update the data source.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 充当用于检索和保存数据的 `DataSet` 与数据源之间的桥梁。The serves as a bridge between a `DataSet` and data source for retrieving and saving data. 通过使用 将数据从数据源加载到 来提供此桥，并使用 将在 中所做的更改发送回数据源。The provides this bridge by using to load data from the data source into the , and using to send changes made in the back to the data source. 当 填充 时，它将为返回的数据创建所需的表和列（如果它们尚不存在）。When the fills a , it creates the required tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，除非 属性设置为 ，否则不会在隐式创建的架构中包含主键信息。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你还可以在使用 填充数据之前， 创建 的架构（包括主键信息）。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using . 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset). > [!NOTE] > 当对不具有主键列的数据源调用 `Fill` 方法时， 尝试将 unique 约束列提升为主键。When you call the `Fill` method on a data source that does not have a primary key column, the tries to promote the unique constraint column to the primary key. 在此过程中， 将 unique 约束标记为不可为 null。In the process, the marks the unique constraint as not nullable. 此行为将起作用，除非 unique 约束列中存在 null 值。This behavior works unless there is a null value in the unique constraint column. 如果有 null 值，`Fill` 方法将失败，并出现约束冲突。If there is a null value, the `Fill` method fails with a constraint violation. 若要避免这种情况，请不要在 unique 约束列中允许空值。To avoid this situation, do not allow null values in the unique constraint column. > [!NOTE] > 由于本机 ODBC 驱动程序的限制，调用 时只会返回一个 。Due to the limitations of native ODBC drivers, only one is ever returned when you call . 即使执行需要多个 对象的 SQL 批处理语句也是如此。This is true even when executing SQL batch statements from which multiple objects would be expected. 还包括 、、、和 `TableMappings` 属性，以便于加载和更新数据。The also includes the , , , , and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 、和 来选择记录并使用所选行填充 `DataSet`。The following example uses , , and to select records and populate a `DataSet` with the selected rows. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 的实例时，以下只写属性和只读属性将设置为其默认值，如表中所示。When you create an instance of , the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table. |属性Properties|默认值Default value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的此实现将 属性设置为在 `selectCommand` 参数中指定的值。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter. 创建 的实例时，以下只写属性和只读属性将设置为其默认值，如表中所示。When you create an instance of , the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的此重载使用 `selectConnectionString` 参数设置 属性。This overload of the constructor uses the `selectConnectionString` parameter to set the property. 但是，它不会打开连接。However, it does not open the connection. 你仍必须显式打开连接。You still must explicitly open the connection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或存储过程，用于删除数据源中的记录。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the data source.

value.span: 在更新操作期间使用的 ，它用来删除数据源中与 中已删除的行相对应的记录。

span.span: An used during an update operation to delete records in the data source that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性分配给之前创建的 时，不会克隆 。When the property is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反， 维护对先前创建的 的引用。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created . 在更新操作过程中，如果未设置 ，并且 中存在主键信息，则可以使用 类来自动生成 ，并使用将 与数据源进行协调所需的其他命令。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate the , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 为此，请设置 的 属性。To do this, set the property of the . 生成逻辑还要求密钥列信息存在于 中。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: 在更新操作期间用于在对应于 中新行的数据源中插入记录的 。

span.span: An used during an update operation to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性分配给之前创建的 对象时，不会克隆 。When the property is assigned to a previously created object, the is not cloned. 相反， 维护对先前创建的 的引用。Instead, maintains a reference to the previously created . 在更新操作过程中，如果未设置 并且主键信息存在于 中，则可以使用 类来自动生成 ，并使用将 与数据源进行协调所需的其他命令。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 为此，请设置 的 属性。To do this, set the property of the . 生成逻辑还要求密钥列信息存在于 中。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令将返回行，则可能会将这些行添加到 ，具体取决于如何设置 对象的 属性。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending upon how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在针对数据源执行命令之后的更新操作期间发生。

span.span: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 时，每个更新的数据行发生两个事件。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值将移至参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果命令设置为 `FirstReturnedRecord`，则返回的第一个结果将放置在 中。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果有输出参数，它们会置于 中。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called.

span.span: DataAdapters and DataReaders

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowUpdating As OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令前的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during before a command is executed against the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 时，每个更新的数据行发生两个事件。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值将移至参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果命令设置为 `FirstReturnedRecord`，则返回的第一个结果将放置在 中。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果有输出参数，它们会置于 中。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called.

summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或存储过程，用于选择数据源中的记录。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to select records in the data source.

value.span: ，在填充操作过程中用于从数据源选择记录以放置在 中。

span.span: An that is used during a fill operation to select records from data source for placement in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 分配给之前创建的 时，不会克隆 。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反， 维护对先前创建的 对象的引用。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果 未返回任何行，则不会将任何表添加到 ，也不会引发异常。If returns no rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 分配给之前创建的 时，不会克隆 。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反， 维护对先前创建的 对象的引用。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created object. 在更新操作过程中，如果未设置 并且主键信息存在于 中，则可以使用 类来自动生成 ，并使用将 与数据源进行协调所需的其他命令。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 为此，请设置 的 属性。To do this, set the property of the . 生成逻辑还要求密钥列信息存在于 中。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令时返回行，则这些行可能与 合并，具体取决于您设置 对象的 属性的方式。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the depending upon how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并设置 和 属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 假设您已经创建了一个 对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]
